user.title: Connect to Visitor Parking
user.description: Select your municipality to connect your visitor parking account.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate
reauth_confirm.description: Your credentials are no longer valid. Enter your updated password.

abort.wrong_account: This account does not match the existing configuration.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect. Check your internet connection.
error.missing_account_id: Could not determine your account id. Try again later.

error.invalid_time_range: Start and end time cannot be the same.

init.title: Edit description
init.description: Update the description and schedule. Times are only required for enabled days. If the start time is after the end time, the schedule continues into the next day.

config_entry_not_loaded.message: The config entry is not loaded.

could_not_determine_zone_end_time.message: Could not determine zone end time

end_time_must_be_after_start_time.message: End time must be after start time

end_time_must_be_before_zone_end_time.message: End time must be before the zone end time

invalid_datetime_string.message: `{field}` must be a datetime string, got: {value}

missing_favorite_name.message: Set a name before creating a favorite

no_config_entries_loaded.message: No config entries are loaded. Add the integration first.

reservation_start_time_not_available.message: Reservation start time is not available

set_config_entry_id_multiple_entries.message: Set `config_entry_id` because multiple entries are configured

start_time_after_working_to.message: This reservation starts after the configured end time ({working_to}). Create it after {zone_end}, or adjust your schedule.

action_not_supported.message: This provider does not support the requested action: {error}

adjust_not_supported.message: This provider does not support adjusting reservation end times

favorite_delete_not_supported.message: This provider does not support deleting favorites
